name: Fizzmod
tag_list: web-development, web-design, search-marketing, seo, ppc, ajax, php, mysql, javascript, html, css, joomla, content-management-systems
overview:
We’re an interactive web design, programming, and marketing firm based in Buenos Aires, Argentina providing cost-effective and high-quality web services

Unique design, creative programming, and search marketing are the active ingredients that we blend to make our holistic web solutions ‘fizz.’ We value the uniqueness of our clients and use our passion to maximize your return of investment (ROI) through an enjoyable and personalized experience.

Our team is a mixture of people from all over the world and we believe that our personalities, differences, and strengths compliment each other to make capable, unique, and fun-to-work-with team.
